sh: line 1: /home/tyler/.config/wlogout/scripts/anction: Permission denied

#!/usr/bin/bash

case $1 in
    shutdown)
        shutdown now
        ;;
    reboot)
        reboot
        ;;
    logout)
        pkill dwl 
        hyprctl dispatch exit
        ;;
    suspend)
        systemctl suspend
        ;;
    hibernate)
        systemctl hibernate
        ;;
    lock)
        hyprlock &
        ;;
    *)
        echo "error"
esac
